title: Unspecified error occurred.Please Check the logs for more information
body:
Anyone knows how to fix the "Unspecified error occurred.Please Check the logs for more information" ?
Please Help!

replies.body: how can i fix "Unspecified error occurred.Pease check the logs for more information" ? I need help

That kind of error can happen when the client runs into an issue and it just doesn't know what exactly went wrong. Most of the time this happens when the patcher is scanning the game files for an update, but the operating system blocks it from scanning everything. 

Let's take a quick minute to update your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that does the trick!
